name: vsav
description: Vampire Savior: The Lord of Vampire (Euro 970519)
story:
When the sun sets and humanity retreats to the imagined safety of their beds, a mysterious entity appears in the night sky to assemble the wicked and the evil. Jedah, one of the high nobles of Makai, is resurrected after a premature death long ago. Seeing the state of the demon world, he decides that the only way to save the world is to recreate it. To this end, he conjures a dimension known as Majigen, to which he summons worthy souls to feed his new world. The secret power of the dark is unleashed.

Eighteen supernatural creatures of myth and legend now materialize to wage their eternal war for domination of the night. Beware meager mortals, as the Darkstalkers arrive, the fate of all humanity rests on who wins this epic struggle. Beat Jedah and take your throne as the Lord of the Darkness.
